description: Lead the design, development, and deployment of machine learning models to solve high-impact business problems, focusing on predictive analytics and A/B testing frameworks.
Design, implement, and maintain scalable, high-performance services in a microservices architecture using modern cloud technologies (AWS/Azure) and languages like TypeScript/Go.
Drive user research, synthesize findings, and translate requirements into wireframes, mockups, and prototypes that deliver intuitive and engaging user experiences across web and mobile platforms.
Own the product roadmap, define feature requirements based on market analysis and user feedback, and collaborate closely with engineering and marketing teams to launch successful products.
Build and manage CI/CD pipelines, ensure system reliability and scalability, and implement infrastructure-as-code (IaC) using Terraform and Kubernetes in a fast-paced cloud environment.
Develop and design secure, highly available, and fault-tolerant solutions on Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Provide technical leadership on cloud adoption strategies and migration projects.
Responsible for end-to-end feature development, spanning responsive frontend UIs using React and scalable backend REST APIs using Node.js and PostgreSQL. Focus on code quality and performance.
Monitor and analyze security alerts, conduct vulnerability assessments, and manage incident response procedures. Implement and maintain security policies (e.g., SOC 2, ISO 27001 compliance).
Design and productionize scalable ML models and algorithms. Focus on model serving, MLOps practices, and collaboration with Data Scientists to transition prototypes to production systems.
Oversee large-scale software development projects, managing cross-functional teams, timelines, and budgets. Ensure adherence to Agile methodologies (Scrum/Kanban) and successful delivery.
Build and maintain the core customer-facing application interface using Vue.js and modern state management techniques. Collaborate with UX team on design system implementation.
Develop and ship native iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI. Focus on performance optimization, API integration, and maintaining high standards of mobile UI/UX.
Manage, optimize, and maintain high-volume SQL and NoSQL database clusters (PostgreSQL, MongoDB). Ensure data security, integrity, and performance through tuning and maintenance.
Provide advanced technical support to internal employees, troubleshooting complex software, hardware, and network issues. Manage ticket resolution and document solutions for the knowledge base.
Design, develop, and deploy robust backend services and APIs using Python and the Django framework. Work on queueing systems and integrating third-party services.
Design, build, and maintain automated test suites using Selenium/Cypress for web applications. Integrate testing into the CI/CD pipeline and collaborate with developers on bug reproduction.
Create clear, concise, and comprehensive documentation for internal engineering teams and external developers (API documentation, user guides, technical specifications).
Bridge the gap between sales and engineering by demonstrating product capabilities to prospective customers and crafting custom technical solutions to meet client needs.
Lead and mentor multiple engineering teams, establish technical standards and architectural direction, and manage the long-term technical strategy and execution of the R&D department.
Design, configure, and maintain enterprise-level network infrastructure (LAN, WAN, VPN, Firewalls). Ensure network security, performance, and uptime across all global offices.
Manage the product backlog for a key application team, define user stories, prioritize features based on business value, and act as the voice of the customer to the development team.
Build, optimize, and maintain robust ETL/ELT data pipelines using tools like Apache Airflow and Spark. Ensure data quality and accessibility for downstream analytical and ML teams.
Specialized role focusing purely on implementing highly accurate and accessible user interfaces from design specifications (Figma/Sketch), utilizing advanced CSS and JavaScript.
Coach and guide multiple teams and leadership on adopting and improving Agile and Scrum practices. Facilitate workshops, ceremonies, and continuous improvement initiatives across the organization.
Conduct cutting-edge research in large language models (LLMs) and generative AI. Publish papers, develop novel algorithms, and collaborate with product teams on patentable technology.
